title: Game freezes in early game since latest patch
body: Don't know why but my game since the latest patch always freezes in bettween 5-10 min mark I have to ctrl+alt+del to shut it and then reconnect, worse than that is that most times my champion doesn't go to base, it simply stands still while I'm disconnected....please help....

replies.body: Same happens to me after like 6-10 min
Issue should be resolved.  If you are still running into this issue please let me know.
